casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Michael Scott HAMILTON. No. 124PA15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Feb. 26, 2016. Benjamin Dowling-Sendor, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Hamilton, Michael Scott. Joseph L. Hyde, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Valerie Mitchell Asbell, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 2nd of April 2015 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Dissolved by order of the Court in conference, this the 26th of February 2016."
